name: Bird Box (CharlieDuffyMassey)
description:
This game does not work in safari as of right now Controls:
  • You can use the arrow keys or WASD for you controls
Game Rules:
  • Don't let the cookie touch the box 
Challenge:
  • Get a high score of 1000
Credits:
  • Music: 
    • Jeremy Blake - Powerup!
    • Joshua McLean - Mountain Trials 
  • Sound Effects:
    • 8-Bit Powerup by SomeGuy22 and available on Pixabay.com
  • Fonts:
    • Mangabey Font by Niskala Huruf available on fontspace.com
  • Backgrounds:
    • Free 2D Cartoon Parallax Background available on assetstore.unity.com and publisher email: cpastegame@gmail.com
    • A Mountain and Forest Landscape Background by Sir Raitan available on itch.io
  • Images for Sprites:
    • Trees Pixel Art Pack and publisher email: freethedoctoronwindows@hotmail.com
    • BEE! by KingKelpo and available on itch.io
    • Bird, Small by rmazanek and available on itch.io
    • 2D Pixel Art - Distant Forest 64x64 by Lifty and available on assetstore.unity.com
    • SunnyLand Enemies Extended Pack by ansimuz and available on itch.io
    • Free Pixel Food by Henry Software available on assetstor.unity.com
    • Pixel Mart by ghostpixxells and available on unity
    • 2D Flying Dragon Enemy by Trimurti Games available on itch.io
